SMW Subobject for HumanNPC location: YanilleUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 883Examine: A sick, frail old man.Release date: 17 May 2005Image: File:Sithik Ints.pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Sithik Ints

Sithik Ints is a wizard, member of H.A.M., and necromancer, who resides upstairs in the guest house in Yanille, north of the Wizards' Guild. He is incriminated during the Zogre Flesh Eaters quest, where his connections to the Humans Against Monsters group and his necromancy responsible for the cursing of Jiggig.

During the quest, the player uses a strange potion on the cup of tea at his bedside to turn him into an ogre, whereupon he reveals the secret to making Relicym's balm and brutal arrows.

If the player tries to take his cup of tea, he will shout at them to stop. If they try to telegrab the cup of tea, he will call them a telegrabbing fiend.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 October 2005 –
7 February 2006

The NPC's examine was changed from undefined ("It's a Sithik Ints.") to "A sick, frail old man." and "Is it a man or is it a monster?"
